Title: Relates to permitting admission of spontaneous statements by victims of certain offenses who are determined to be incapacitated
Summary: Permits admission of spontaneous statements by victims of certain fraud, abuse and theft offenses who are determined to be incapacitated.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the criminal procedure law, in relation to permitting admission of spontaneous statements by victims of certain offenses who are determined to be incapacitated
